short_description.en: The Weatherization Assistance Program implements home energy conservation measures at no cost for income-qualified residents. Application required.

contractor_restrictions: Measures must be recommended by a WAP-certified energy auditer and measures implemented by a WAP-certified contractor.
income_restrictions: Individuals and families must be at or below 200% of the Federal Poverty Line (FPL)
other_restrictions: For eligible homeowners and renters, there is no direct cost to participate in the program.  Owners of eligible rental properties may be required to pay of 50% of any capital improvement measures that are installed.

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

short_description.en: The Weatherization Assistance Program implements home energy conservation measures at no cost for income-qualified residents. Application required.

contractor_restrictions: Measures must be recommended by a WAP-certified energy auditer and measures implemented by a WAP-certified contractor.
income_restrictions: Households whose annual gross income is at or below 150% of the federal poverty income guidelines (established by the Office of Management and Budget) are eligible for assistance
other_restrictions: For eligible homeowners and renters, there is no direct cost to participate in the program.  Owners of eligible rental properties may be required to pay of 50% of any capital improvement measures that are installed.

errors.message: must be equal to one of the allowed values

other_restrictions: For eligible homeowners and renters, there is no direct cost to participate in the program.  Owners of eligible rental properties may be required to pay of 50% of any capital improvement measures that are installed.
